snippet.title: 50 Mission Crush for the Apple II
snippet.description:
A strategy game (and NOT a RPG like it says on the cover!!!) that is quite slow.

Well, some will like it that this game is slow, some not...


By the way, on emulator it is quite hard to figure out the controls, lol.
